messages.subject: Samurai Archives - RECENT UPDATES
messages.msgSnippet: Recent Updates to the Samurai Archives Japanese History Page www.techjapanese.com/samurai/index.html ***SPECIAL*** A new section not yet added to the site -
messages.messageBody:
Recent Updates to the Samurai Archives Japanese History Page
www.techjapanese.com/samurai/index.html

***SPECIAL***
A new section not yet added to the site - 'Military Aspects of the
Daimyo' by F.W. Seal - Available at:
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/military.html

The 'sengoku samurai registry' now has approximately 530 entries:
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/registry.html

The japanese samurai heraldry section has been added:
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/crest1.html

Japanese Kanji names has been added - currently includes the Japanese
reading for 50 Japanese historical names:
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/kanji.html

The glossary of terms has been expanded to include more japanese
samurai related vocabulary:
http://www.techjapanese.com/samurai/vocab.html

As always, don't forget to stop by the Samurai history forum on
Delphi.com - join in the conversation, feel free to post any
questions or comments related to japanese history:
http://www.delphi.com/samuraihistory/


CEWest
---
Visit the Archives! Samurai Archives Japanese History Page.
http://www.techjapanese.com/~samurai/index.html
